price: 35. As a Favour from Us. Thus do We reward him who gives thanks (by obeying Us).
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
